NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN 13-30.52N 043-13.04W
AT 111918Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
